about_the_game:
Hello!, The story begins then the Colony on the Ice star is raided,
and the mining spaceship is captured, the Captain must do
something to save his men and the mining colony from the
raiders.
The Game 3d shooter , includes many different items and weapons to use in game,
Interesting mini quests as this is a shooter game with ammo and weapons,
free open scene world for this part of story, there you can move in any
direction, just be sure you are ready for the new challenge, and many
characters that will tell you important information, but not all will be happy
to share their information in some cases.

In game there are not only weapons and some items to use,
there are -Score, you can get then you play and fight some enemy,
and different -Statuses, that will change with time you play, this futures
will make you more friendly to the characters in game, and they will change
their minds about you, some will like you some will not, depending on what
you are doing in the game, game will change.

Thank God , the Captain survives and escapes to the cold and dark planet
surface, He can not go back to the mining ship, and must do
something to stop the raiders, but he is not alone, Big Boss,
who pays the raiders to control the area, is keeping a secret
laboratory with partial stealth technology,
and will do all to secure his business.

Use keys, W,A,S,D to move, and mouse to look around,
shoot and Zoom with weapons, F for flashlight, Shift to
run, E to use items in game, 1-9, 0, Weapons.

The story will change depend on your activity in game,
Thank and have fun.

name: Ice Star

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7,8,10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 7,8,10
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core (i5 2300) or AMD Octo-Core (FX 8150)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660Ti or greater, AMD Radeon HD 7950 or greater, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
